name: Dubai, UAE
description: Discover Dubai and Abu Dhabi with iconic landmarks, thrilling desert safaris, vibrant city tours, and unforgettable views from Burj Khalifa.

name: Sri Lanka
description: Experience Sri Lanka’s beauty with cultural temples, ancient rock fortresses, lush gardens, and wildlife encounters in this island paradise journey.

name: Almaty, Kazakhstan
description: Explore Almaty with a scenic city tour, bustling bazaars, breathtaking mountains, and natural landscapes that showcase Kazakhstan’s charm and culture.

name: Europe & London
description: Travel across Europe and London with famous attractions, stunning architecture, and cultural experiences from Paris to Rome in one adventure.

name: Baku, Azerbaijan
description: Visit Baku’s blend of medieval old city and futuristic architecture, while enjoying rich culture, history, and scenic tours of nearby regions.

name: Vietnam
description: Discover Vietnam with cultural landmarks, serene bays, bustling cities, and iconic bridges, blending modern lifestyle with ancient traditions beautifully.

name: Bali, Indonesia
description: Enjoy Bali’s tropical charm with island tours, traditional dances, temple visits, and thrilling water sports, all set in scenic paradise views.
